content:
I do not have the ability to predict the future, but there are several ahl players who have the potential to become nhl stars in the future. here are a few examples:

1. trevor zegras - zegras is a highly-touted prospect for the anaheim ducks who is currently playing for the san diego gulls in the ahl. he was a first-round pick in the 2019 nhl entry draft and has shown great promise in his young career.

2. cole caufield - caufield was a first-round pick by the montreal canadiens in the 2019 nhl entry draft and is currently playing for the laval rocket in the ahl. he set records at the university of wisconsin and is known for his elite scoring ability.

3. alex turcotte - turcotte was a first-round pick by the los angeles kings in the 2019 nhl entry draft and is currently playing for the ontario reign in the ahl. he has a well-rounded game and is known for his grit and determination.

these players are just a few examples of the many talented prospects who are currently playing in the ahl. with hard work and dedication, they have the potential to become nhl stars in the future.
